actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water and Power.

official_title: To amend the Reclamation Wastewater and Groundwater Study and Facilities Act to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to participate in the Santa Rosa Urban Water Reuse Plan.
short_title: Santa Rosa Urban Water Reuse Plan Act
subjects: Federal aid to water resources development

summary.text: Santa Rosa Urban Water Reuse Plan Act - Amends the Reclamation Wastewater and Groundwater Study and Facilities Act to authorize the Secretary of the Interior, in cooperation with the city of Santa Rosa, California, to participate in design, planning, and construction of projects to implement the Santa Rosa Urban Water Reuse Plan.

titles.title: Santa Rosa Urban Water Reuse Plan Act
To amend the Reclamation Wastewater and Groundwater Study and Facilities Act to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to participate in the Santa Rosa Urban Water Reuse Plan.
